values: Soli Deo Gloria: Heart and Soul of the ReformationSoli Deo Gloria: Heart and Soul of the Reformation

God works every dot on the timeline of history for his glory. Nothing stands outside the scope of his plan to bring fame to his name, for the joy of his people.God works every dot on the timeline of history for his glory.
